books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.notes: A masterpiece of American literature. The green light symbolizes hope and dreams.

books.author: George Orwell
books.notes: Disturbing but brilliant. Big Brother is watching.

books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.notes: Recommended by many friends. Looking forward to reading this classic.

books.title: The Catcher in the Rye
books.author: J.D. Salinger
books.notes: Interesting perspective on teenage rebellion. Holden's voice is unique.

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.notes: Timeless romance. Elizabeth Bennet is a wonderful character.

books.title: The Hobbit
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.notes: Epic fantasy adventure. Bilbo's journey is captivating.

books.title: Dune
books.author: Frank Herbert
books.notes: Complex world-building. Heard great things about this sci-fi classic.

books.title: The Handmaid's Tale
books.author: Margaret Atwood
books.notes: Powerful and disturbing. Atwood's vision is haunting.

books.title: Sapiens
books.author: Yuval Noah Harari
books.notes: Fascinating look at human history. Changed my perspective on civilization.

books.title: The Silent Patient
books.author: Alex Michaelides
books.notes: Psychological thriller that everyone's talking about. Can't wait to read it.

books.title: Educated
books.author: Tara Westover
books.notes: Incredible memoir about education and family. Inspiring and heartbreaking.

books.title: The Seven Husbands of Evelyn Hugo
books.author: Taylor Jenkins Reid
books.notes: Engaging story about old Hollywood. Evelyn is a complex character.

books.title: The Midnight Library
books.author: Matt Haig
books.notes: Thought-provoking story about life choices and regrets. Beautifully written.

books.title: Atomic Habits
books.author: James Clear
books.notes: Practical guide to building good habits and breaking bad ones. Very insightful.

books.title: The Alchemist
books.author: Paulo Coelho
books.notes: A fable about following your dreams. Heard it's life-changing.

books.title: The Book Thief
books.author: Markus Zusak
books.notes: Heartbreaking and beautiful. Death as a narrator is brilliant.

books.title: Thinking, Fast and Slow
books.author: Daniel Kahneman
books.notes: Deep dive into how our minds work. Challenging but fascinating.

books.title: The Kite Runner
books.author: Khaled Hosseini
books.notes: Story of friendship and redemption. Looking forward to this emotional journey.

books.title: Project Hail Mary
books.author: Andy Weir
books.notes: Amazing sci-fi adventure. Rocky is the best alien character ever!

books.title: The Psychology of Money
books.author: Morgan Housel
books.notes: Great insights on money and behavior. Easy to understand and practical.

books.title: Circe
books.author: Madeline Miller
books.notes: Retelling of Greek mythology from Circe's perspective. Can't wait to read this!
